dependencies.npm: Used for package management and running development scripts
dependencies.docker: Used for building and running the application container

ports.9000: Used for development mode, mapped to the container's port 9000

environment_variables.NODE_ENV: Set to 'development' or 'production' depending on the action

volumes.flux-site-vol-node: Mounts the node_modules directory for dependency sharing
volumes.flux-site-vol-bundle-gems: Mounts the .bundle-gems directory for dependency sharing
volumes.flux-site-vol-bundle: Binds the project directory to the container for code access
